entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
